string.text: 12.7x55 mm STs-130орC AP rounds for VSSK

The armour-piercing 12.7x55mm subsonic cartridge is used exclusively in the VKS bullpup sniper rifle. Despite being chambered in the same cartridge, the Ash-12 would not be able to feed or chamber rounds designed for the VKS due to significant length differences in the bullet, which is twice the mass.
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR6 (80) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]82

The solid brass 12.7x55mm subsonic cartridge is used exclusively in the VKS bullpup sniper rifle for scenarios where armour penetration is secondary to the accuracy of the shot and the damage dealt to the target. Despite being chambered in the same cartridge, the Ash-12 would not be able to feed or chamber rounds designed for the VKS due to significant length differences in the bullet, which is twice the mass.
 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Armor penetration power (AP): %c[ui_gray_1]BR3 (40) 
%c[ui_gray_2] - %c[ui_gray_2] Nominal stopping power (DMG): %c[ui_gray_1]102
